task.title: How to make a breakfast burrito bowl
task.shortdesc: Breakfast burrito bowl information and recipe

context.p: Kitchen supplies needed for this recipe:

ul.li: 1/2 of a 15 oz. can of black beans

step.cmd: Peel sweet potato and microwave for 4 minute.
When done, slice into 1/2 inch cubes.
In a large frying pan saute sweet potato, black beans with a tablespoon of olive oil, adding salt and pepper tot taste for 15 minutes.
In a separate non-stick pan, scramble 4 eggs.
While eggs, sweet potato, and beans are cooking, grate the cheddar cheese.
Top greens with divided cooked sweet potato and beans, scrambled eggs, sliced avocado, and sprinkle with cheddar cheese.
Sprinkle grated cheddar cheese on top of the burrito bowl.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
